mention_address: "Lindsay Wildlife Experience, Briones to Mt. Diablo Trail, Walnut Creek, Contra Costa County, California, 94597, United States of America"
attraction_reviewComments: Not that expensive and has a really neat interactive bird rescue section. It's not a huge place but enough to entertain the kids.

Just an interesting place to visit if you're in the area. Happened on it by accident, and were glad we did.

Wonderful little museum especially for younger children (10 and under) and animal lovers.. Borders Larkey Park where kids can run and play.
A great visit for kids 12 and younger. Lots of hands on activities and tons to look at. Definitely worth a visit !!
